content.raw:
Some CI results:

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-none&build=1027)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-none/1027/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-none/1027/
* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia&build=781)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia/781/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia/781/

The window build of gazebo9 on osrf/gazebo is now fixed as of pull request #3060, but this branch failed since it doesn't have those changes; can you sync your fork with the most recent changes?

there are a bunch of failures in the Ubuntu builds related to Collada parsing, so I think there is a regression in there somewhere

* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-none/1027/testReport/
content.html:
Some CI results:

  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-none/1027/
  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia/781/

The window build of gazebo9 on osrf/gazebo is now fixed as of pull request #3060, but this branch failed since it doesn't have those changes; can you sync your fork with the most recent changes?

there are a bunch of failures in the Ubuntu builds related to Collada parsing, so I think there is a regression in there somewhere

  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-none/1027/testReport/
